sentences.en: Dalian said that henceforth only common surnames would be used.
sentences.cn: 大连当局说以后将给这孩子起一些大众化的姓氏.

sentences.en: Every will encounter this kind of trouble henceforth but analogize.
sentences.cn: 今后凡碰到这种事可类推.

sentences.en: Henceforth his life would never be the same again.
sentences.cn: 从今以后他的生活将不再像从前一样.

sentences.en: Henceforth it will continue to change to our advantage.
sentences.cn: 今后这种形势还会继续向有利的方面改变.

sentences.en: Henceforth my path will not lie through palaces, nor my conversation be with kings.
sentences.cn: 从今以后,我的道路不再通过宫廷殿堂, 我的交往不再是王公贵胄.

sentences.en: Henceforth will I remember this secret and it will change my life.
sentences.cn: 从此,我要记住这一秘诀,它能改变我的生活.

sentences.en: Henceforth, in Equation 3 - 6 , the force F is understood to be the parallel component.
sentences.cn: 从现在开始, 方程( 3-6 )中的力F应该理解为平行分量.

sentences.en: I am going to live at liberty and my pleasure henceforth.
sentences.cn: 我打算自由和随心所欲的过日子今后!

sentences.en: I mean from henceforth to lead a life of extreme seclusion.
sentences.cn: 我决定从今天起将过一种完全与世隔绝的生活.

sentences.en: If I were dead, that could not be surer than it is henceforth.
sentences.cn: 就算让我死去也不会有更可靠的保证的.

sentences.en: KJV Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
sentences.cn: [新译]以色列啊!你要仰望耶和华,从现在直到永远.

sentences.en: multiple sclerosis (henceforth referred to as MS)
Once the desired specific gravity is established, the same strength must be used henceforth.
sentences.cn: 所需的比重一经确定, 以后就必须使用同一浓度的酸.

sentences.en: Sina board of directors henceforth will more unite, sufficient accredit.
sentences.cn: 新浪董事会今后将会更加团结, 充分授权.

sentences.en: The Sheffield gained contact with the Bismarck and henceforth held her for sure.
sentences.cn: 这时“谢斐尔德”号又找到了“俾斯麦”号的踪迹,并一直死钉住了它.

sentences.en: Will answer to develop new applied field actively henceforth.
sentences.cn: 今后应积极开发新的应用领域.

words.tran_cn: 今后；从今以后；自此以后
